messages.content: You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
How do I book a flight?
Hi! You can book a flight by visiting our website or using our mobile app. Simply enter your travel details and follow the instructions. If you need further assistance, I'm here to help!
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
What is the baggage allowance for my flight?
The baggage allowance depends on your destination and ticket class. Please provide your flight details, and I will give you the specific information.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
How do I check in online?
To check in online, visit our website or mobile app and enter your booking reference and last name. Follow the prompts to complete the check-in process.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
What time should I arrive at the airport?
It's recommended to arrive at least 2 hours before a domestic flight and 3 hours before an international flight. This ensures you have enough time for check-in, security checks, and boarding.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
How can I check the status of my flight?
ou can check the status of your flight on our website or mobile app by entering your flight number.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
How do I cancel my flight?
You can cancel your flight through our website or mobile app by entering your booking reference.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
How do I request special assistance at the airport?
You can request special assistance during the booking process or by contacting our customer service.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
Can I bring my pet on the flight?
Yes, pets are allowed on our flights with certain restrictions.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
What items are prohibited in carry-on luggage?
Common prohibited items include sharp objects, flammable liquids, and certain electronics. For a detailed list, please visit our website or let me know if you need specific information.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
How can I contact customer support?
You can contact our customer support through our website, mobile app, or by calling our hotline. If you need immediate assistance, I'm here to help!
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
What documents do I need for international travel?
For international travel, you'll need a valid passport and may require a visa, depending on your destination. Always check the specific entry requirements for the country you're visiting.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
What should I do if I lose my boarding pass?
If you lose your boarding pass, you can reprint it at a self-service kiosk at the airport or ask for assistance at the airline's check-in counter.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
How much does it cost to check an extra bag?
The cost for checking an extra bag varies depending on your route and ticket class. Check our website for the latest fees and allowances.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
What items are allowed in my checked baggage?
Generally, you can pack clothing, toiletries, and personal items in your checked baggage. However, items such as flammable materials, explosives, and certain electronics are prohibited.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
Can I carry sports equipment on the flight?
You can request a special meal during the booking process or by contacting our customer service at least 24 hours before your flight.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
Is there assistance available for passengers with disabilities?
Yes, we provide assistance for passengers with disabilities. You can request this service during the booking process or by contacting our customer service team.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
Are there lounges available at the airport?
Yes, we have lounges available at many airports. Access may depend on your ticket class or frequent flyer status. Check our website for lounge locations and access policies.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
What amenities are available in the airport lounge?
Our airport lounges typically offer comfortable seating, complimentary food and beverages, Wi-Fi, and charging stations. Some lounges also have showers and business facilities.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
What are the different types of tickets available?
We offer various types of tickets including economy, premium economy, business, and first class. Each class comes with different levels of comfort and services.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
Can I upgrade my ticket?
Yes, you can upgrade your ticket if there are available seats in the higher class. Please visit our website or contact customer service for more details.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
What is the refund policy for my ticket?

Our refund policy varies depending on the ticket type and fare conditions. Generally, refundable tickets allow for cancellations with a full or partial refund, while non-refundable tickets do not. Check our website for specific details.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
How do I get a copy of my ticket?
You can get a copy of your ticket by logging into your account on our website or mobile app. You can also request a copy by contacting our customer service.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
Can I transfer my ticket to someone else?
No, airline tickets are non-transferable. The name on the ticket must match the traveler's identification.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
What happens if I miss my flight?
If you miss your flight, please contact our customer service as soon as possible. Depending on your ticket type, you may be able to rebook for a later flight.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
Are there any discounts available for tickets?
We offer various discounts throughout the year, including promotions for early bookings, group travel, and special occasions. Check our website for the latest offers.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
Can I book a ticket for someone else?
Yes, you can book a ticket for someone else. Make sure to enter the correct passenger details during the booking process.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
What is a standby ticket?
A standby ticket allows a passenger to wait for an available seat on a flight that is fully booked. This is usually subject to seat availability and certain conditions.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
How do I use an e-ticket?
An e-ticket, or electronic ticket, can be used by showing the confirmation email or the ticket details on your mobile device at check-in. You do not need a physical ticket.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
What are the different types of tickets available?
We offer various types of tickets including economy, premium economy, business, and first class. Each class comes with different levels of comfort and services.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.

Yes, you can upgrade your ticket if there are available seats in the higher class. Please visit our website or contact customer service for more details.

Our refund policy varies depending on the ticket type and fare conditions. Generally, refundable tickets allow for cancellations with a full or partial refund, while non-refundable tickets do not. Check our website for specific details.

How do I use an e-ticket?
An e-ticket, or electronic ticket, can be used by showing the confirmation email or the ticket details on your mobile device at check-in. You do not need a physical ticket.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
Can I change the date of my ticket?
Yes, you can change the date of your ticket. However, this may be subject to a fee and availability. Please check our website or contact customer service for more information.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
What is the difference between a refundable and non-refundable ticket?
A refundable ticket allows you to cancel your flight and get a full or partial refund, whereas a non-refundable ticket does not offer a refund if you cancel your flight.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
How do I check the status of my ticket?
You can check the status of your ticket by logging into your account on our website or mobile app. You can also contact our customer service for assistance.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
Can I add a passenger to my existing booking?
No, you cannot add a passenger to an existing booking. You will need to book a separate ticket for the additional passenger.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
What is a multi-city ticket?
A multi-city ticket allows you to book flights to multiple destinations in one itinerary. This is useful for travelers planning to visit several cities during their trip.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
Can I request a seat assignment when booking my ticket?
Yes, you can request a seat assignment when booking your ticket. Seat selection is subject to availability and may incur an additional fee for certain seats.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
What payment methods are accepted for ticket purchases?
We accept various payment methods including credit cards, debit cards, and online payment options. Check our website for the full list of accepted payment methods.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
Can I get a receipt for my ticket purchase?
Yes, you can get a receipt for your ticket purchase by logging into your account on our website or mobile app. You can also request a receipt by contacting our customer service.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
Are there any additional fees when booking a ticket?
There may be additional fees for services such as seat selection, baggage, and in-flight meals. Check our website for a detailed breakdown of any applicable fees.
You are a helpful assistant as FAQ support.
Can I book a one-way ticket?
Yes, you can book a one-way ticket. Simply select the one-way option when entering your travel details on our website or mobile app.
